title: why now?
body:
it felt like a paradigm shift.
from 80% vibe, 20% bug fixing.
to 100% vibecoding - one shotted. every time.

and with that change came a feeling of vertigo.
a feeling like something big was happening and speeding up.
acceleration.

In 2019 I spent most of my time interested in buddhism and meditation and the thought of work was very from my mind.
